purpose: To provide a centralized repository of curated lists for different aspects of artificial intelligence, making it easier for users to find valuable resources.
principle: Aggregates and categorizes various 'awesome lists' related to AI, deep learning, and machine learning.
reusability: Can be used as a reference or starting point for AI research, education, and project development.
limitations: Content is dependent on external curated lists, which may vary in quality and update frequency.
name: awesome-awesome-artificial-intelligence
description: A curated list of awesome curated lists of many topics related to artificial intelligence.
highlight: A comprehensive collection of curated lists related to various artificial intelligence topics.
